amendment.description: To provide for the establishment of a demonstration project to clarify the definition of homebound.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1023 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1023 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S8681-8682; text: CR S8681-8682) To provide for the establishment of a demonstration project to clarify the definition of homebound.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1023 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Collins.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1023 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
